Hello World, I am Camila, a Full-Stack Web Developer Who Turns Coffee into Code.

I have a passion for building amazing web applications that solve real-world problems, always looking for ways to make my code more efficient and effective. Whether it's working on the front-end, back-end, or everything in between, I'm always up for a challenge.

Learn more about what I do

ABOUT ME

WHO IS THIS GIRL?

Computer Programming college graduate and versatile Web Developer based in Toronto. My expertise includes JavaScript, HTML/CSS, React, NextJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, Firebase, and more. Building robust, feature-rich web applications is my driving force! Nothing excites me more than utilizing my skills to develop modern and responsive web applications that deliver exceptional functionality and remarkable user experience..

Problem-solving and analytical skills

Adaptability and willingness to learn

Strong communicaiton skills
